string.name: emailConfirm_click
string.comment:
emailConfirm_click
Part of the confirmation email upon registering for a Chess-Online account.
The unique reset link is presented just after this string.

resources.string: Tsindrio ity rohy ity hanamarihana ny kaonty Chess-Online-nao:
Aza raharahiana ity hafatra ity raha tsy namorona kaonty Chess-Online ianao.
